candidates.name: Lester Freamon
candidates.long_description: You follow the drugs, and you're going to get drug addicts and drug dealers. But you start to follow the money... and you don't know where the fuck it's going to take you.

candidates.name: Bunk Moreland
candidates.short_description: I'm just a humble motherfucker with a big ass dick.
candidates.long_description: I'm a murder police. I work murders. I don't fuck with no make-believe. I don't jerk shit around. I catch a murder, and I work it.

candidates.short_description: You come at the king... you best not miss.
candidates.long_description: I got the shotgun, you got the briefcase. It's all in the game though, right?

candidates.name: Bodie
candidates.short_description: This game is rigged, man. We like the little bitches on a chessboard.

candidates.name: Clay Davis
candidates.long_description: You think I have time to ask a man why he giving me money? Or where he gets his money from? I'll take any motherfucker's money if he givin' it away!
